content: project level easy description the spirit earflap hat is a fun and simple design the hat brim and earflaps are worked in one piece from the top down the textured ribbing gives the hat a special touch and is completed with braided ties and a pom pom specifics size 0-3 months 3-6 months 6-12 months toddler child teen adult gauge 2 = 4 double_crochet row and 7 double_crochet sts hook size 5 5mm i crochet hook* see notes other tools tapestry needle scissors pom maker yarn weight medium 4 worsted weight yarn used premier just yarn red heart with love wecrochet / knit picks brava worsted other materials n/a size guide 0-3 months 13 head circumference 3-6 months 14 head circumference 6-12 months 16 head circumference toddler 18 head circumference child 20 head circumference teen 21 head circumference adult 23 head circumference - pattern is written in standard us crochet terms - the pdf listed for sale contains the full pattern - please note all sales are final on digital items no refunds will be made view my blog to see more of my patterns www thenicolechase com pattern copyright © 2023 nicole chase all rights reserved pattern may not be altered copied redistributed or sold as your own pattern you may sell the finished product on a small scale pattern/design credit given to www thenicolechase com is appreciated permission to sell does not include mass production large scale production is prohibited photography copyright © 2023 nicole chase all rights reserved photos may not be altered copied redistributed or sold as your own
